entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing late this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries near noon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 8. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 14 April 2023
